page.title: 07CLUBS
page.content: There are many different clubs in Pelsall. Our investigations have shown that one in every six people attended at least one of Pelsall,s clubs and societies. Considering the number of clubs in Pelsall offering a wide choice of interests we expected a larger proportion of people to be involved in a club. To show this variety of interests offered the following are just a few of the clubs and societies which are represented in Pelsall:Keep-Fit, Pelsall Scouts, Youth Clubs,Lace Making,Flower Arranging.
